mapper.select: select config_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag from sys_config where config_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_config(config_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag) values (#{configId}, #{configName}, #{configKey}, #{configValue}, #{configType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{remark}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{delFlag})

insert into sys_config(config_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag) values
(#{entity.configId}, #{entity.configName}, #{entity.configKey}, #{entity.configValue}, #{entity.configType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delFlag})

insert into sys_config(config_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, remark, create_user, update_user, del_flag) values
(#{entity.configId}, #{entity.configName}, #{entity.configKey}, #{entity.configValue}, #{entity.configType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delFlag})
on duplicate key update config_id = values(config_id), config_name = values(config_name), config_key = values(config_key), config_value = values(config_value), config_type = values(config_type), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), tenant_id = values(tenant_id), remark = values(remark), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user), del_flag = values(del_flag)
mapper.update:
update sys_config
config_name = #{configName},
config_key = #{configKey},
config_value = #{configValue},
config_type = #{configType},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
remark = #{remark},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where config_id = #{configId}
